unnormalised: Delhiites, get ready! The IMD predicts a scorcher for the next few days. Expect temps hitting 43°C on 17/05/2024, potentially crossing 45°C by 20/05/2024. Looks like the loo winds are coming early this year, folks! Best to stay hydrated and avoid peak afternoon hours between 12 PM and 4 PM.
normalised: Delhiites, get ready! The I-M-D predicts a scorcher for the next few days. Expect temps hitting forty three degree celsius on seventeenth May two thousand and twenty four, potentially crossing forty five degree celsius by twentieth May two thousand and twenty four. Looks like the loo winds are coming early this year, folks! Best to stay hydrated and avoid peak afternoon hours between twelve P-M and four P-M.

unnormalised: And it's not just the heat; keep an eye out for dust storms too. The met department says visibility might drop to under 500 meters in some areas. The advisory recommends covering your face when you're outside, especially if you're riding a two-wheeler. Commuters, take note!
normalised: And it's not just the heat; keep an eye out for dust storms too. The met department says visibility might drop to under five hundred meters in some areas. The advisory recommends covering your face when you're outside, especially if you're riding a two-wheeler. Commuters, take note!

unnormalised: Relief is (hopefully) on the way! There's a slight chance of a thunderstorm on 22/05/2024, maybe bringing the temperature down to a slightly more bearable 38°C. Let's all pray to Indra Devta for some much-needed rain!
normalised: Relief is (hopefully) on the way! There's a slight chance of a thunderstorm on twenty second May two thousand and twenty four, maybe bringing the temperature down to a slightly more bearable thirty eight degree celsius. Let's all pray to Indra Devta for some much-needed rain!

unnormalised: Stay safe everyone! Check the official IMD website (imd.gov.in) for the latest updates. Remember, precaution is better than cure. Have a cool glass of nimbu pani and prepone any outdoor activities if possible!
